name: 'Walker Texas Ranger': The Wedding Quiz | Television | 15 Questions

questions.text: Who took the tuxes for Walker's wedding?
questions.explanation:
Trivette.

	Trivette put all the tuxes in the trunk of his green Mustang.

they were blown up.

	Gage pushed a grenade under Trivette's car and the car blew up along with the tuxes. Gage (after the car blew up)"Whoops!" Trivette: "Duh!"

questions.text: What country did Gage say he and Trivette were going to have to go to get away from Walker?
questions.explanation:
Australia.

	Gage: "Ah, man, we should just move to Australia!" Trivette: "No, man, that's not far enough." Gage: "You're right. It's not far enough."

questions.text: Which sports team did Mark own?
questions.explanation:
Mavericks.

	Walker mentioned this when they were preparing for the wedding rehearsal. Mark Cuban ownded the Dallas Mavericks basketball team.

questions.text: What weapon was Mr. Cahill attacked with?
questions.explanation:
ice knife.

	Alex was the intended victim, but it got her father instead. The knife was made out of ice so it melted causing the police not to discover the weapon.

questions.text: Alex's father died from his injuries.
questions.explanation:
False.

	He made the doctor take him to Alex's wedding so he could walk her down the aisle.

questions.text: What famous actor married Alex and Walker?
questions.explanation:
Tom Bosley.

	He played the minister that married Alex and Walker.

questions.text: Where did Trivette say CD was stuck at?
questions.explanation:
Tokyo.

	In reality, Noble Willingham was running for office and had to leave the cast of the show.

questions.text: Which country singer sang at the wedding?
questions.explanation:
Tracy Lawrence.

	Although, Lila, Michael and Collin have all performed on 'Walker, Texas Ranger', Tracy Lawrence sang for the wedding. He performed 'Stars over Texas', 'You and Me', and 'Long, Wet Kiss'.

questions.text: What was significant about the flower girls?
questions.explanation:
Chuck Norris' twin granddaughters.

	Chuck Norris' twin granddaughters played the flower girls and they also got to dance with their grandpa while the little boy Alex danced with was her real life son, Nicholas.

questions.text: Where were Alex and Walker going on their honeymoon?
questions.explanation:
Paris.

	Walker got a deal on a Paris honeymoon and Alex carried a book with her on how to speak French.

questions.text: What did Alex say ran in her family?
Did Walker and Alex have trouble getting to their honeymoon destination?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	Alex was held hostage, the plane was shot causing it to decompress and Walker had to fly the plane.

questions.text: Who kissed each other at CD's Bar and Grill after word came that the plane landed safely?
questions.explanation:
Sydney and Gage.

	Gage and Sydney kissed after they heard the plane landed safely, but Trivette had his back turned to them and didn't see it.

questions.text: What Parisian monument was seen in the reflection of the French doors at Walker and Alex's hotel room?
questions.explanation:
Eiffel Tower.

	Walker and Alex closed the doors and in the reflection you could see the Eiffel Tower.
